name: json-proxy
description: Grunt plugin / CLI utility / Express middleware to proxy API requests to remote servers without CORS or JSONP.

0.0.1.name: json-proxy
0.0.1.description: A static file web server for UI developers that proxies JSON API calls to one or more remote web servers.

0.0.3.description: A static file web server for UI developers that proxies JSON API calls to one or more remote web servers without requiring CORS or JSONP.
